localize.description: See what's buzzing on Product Hunt in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Ziplyne is a Digital Adoption Platform to create in-app guidance & product onboarding for your Customers. Early stage companies and large enterprises are selecting Ziplyne as their DAP to get the most out of their existing SaaS enterprise software.
blogPost.body: Ziplyne is a Digital Adoption Platform to create in-app guidance & product onboarding for your Customers. Early stage companies and large enterprises are selecting Ziplyne as their DAP to get the most out of their existing SaaS enterprise software.
blogPost.title: Ziplyne - Digital adoption for your customer & employee software
blogPost.author: Rome Chopra

previous.excerpt: Meet The Ultimate OKR Starter Guide adapted for early-stage startups. This is the most comprehensive OKRs guide with examples of objectives by departments, common mistakes, scores benchmarks, and advice from 3000+ teams that succeed with OKRs.
